ChangeInstanceAzone.title: ChangeInstanceAzone
ChangeInstanceAzone.summary: Changes the zone of a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

CheckDrdsDbName.title: CheckDrdsDbName
CheckDrdsDbName.summary: Checks whether the name of the CheckDrdsDbName database is valid.

CheckExpandStatus.title: CheckExpandStatus
CheckExpandStatus.summary: Verifies whether scale-out operations such as smooth scale-out can be performed on a PolarDB-X database.

CheckSqlAuditEnableStatus.title: CheckSqlAuditEnableStatus
CheckSqlAuditEnableStatus.summary: Checks whether the SQL audit feature is enabled for the logical database of a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

CreateInstanceAccount.title: CreateInstanceAccount
CreateInstanceAccount.summary: Creates an account used to manage a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

CreateInstanceInternetAddress.title: CreateInstanceInternetAddress
CreateInstanceInternetAddress.summary: Creates CreateInstanceInternetAddress public IP address for a DRDS instance.

CreateOrderForRds.title: CreateOrderForRds
CreateOrderForRds.summary: Creates an order to purchase an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance.

CreateShardTask.title: CreateShardTask
CreateShardTask.summary: Call CreateShardTask to create a sharding task.

DescribeBackMenu.title: DescribeBackMenu
DescribeBackMenu.summary: Call the interface DescribeBackMenu to check whether the DRDS instance supports restorate the backup.

DescribeBackupDbs.title: DescribeBackupDbs
DescribeBackupDbs.summary: You can call this operation to query the list of databases that can be restored.

DescribeBackupLocal.title: DescribeBackupLocal
DescribeBackupLocal.summary: Queries the backup settings of local logs.

DescribeBackupPolicy.title: DescribeBackupPolicy
DescribeBackupPolicy.summary: Queries the information about a backup policy.

DescribeBackupTimes.title: DescribeBackupTimes
DescribeBackupTimes.summary: Queries the time range within which the data of an instance can be restored to a point in time.

DescribeDbInstanceDbs.title: DescribeDbInstanceDbs
DescribeDbInstanceDbs.summary: Queries information about storage-layer databases in a specific storage instance.

DescribeDbInstances.title: DescribeDbInstances
DescribeDbInstances.summary: Queries DescribeDbInstances of the storage layer, such as RDS or PolarDB.

DescribeDrdsDB.title: DescribeDrdsDB
DescribeDrdsDB.summary: Queries details about a database that is deployed in a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

DescribeDrdsDBCluster.title: DescribeDrdsDBCluster
DescribeDrdsDBCluster.summary: You can call this operation to query the information of the PolarDB cluster in the DRDS logical database.

DescribeDrdsDBIpWhiteList.title: DescribeDrdsDBIpWhiteList
DescribeDrdsDBIpWhiteList.summary: Queries the IP address whitelist for a specified DRDS database.

DescribeDrdsDBs.title: DescribeDrdsDBs
DescribeDrdsDBs.summary: Queries the databases on a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

DescribeDrdsDbInstance.title: DescribeDrdsDbInstance
DescribeDrdsDbInstance.summary: Queries the details of a custom ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance used as the storage of PolarDB-X 1.0.

DescribeDrdsDbInstances.title: DescribeDrdsDbInstances
DescribeDrdsDbInstances.summary: Queries ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instances that are used to store the data of a database.

DescribeDrdsDbRdsNameList.title: DescribeDrdsDbRdsNameList
DescribeDrdsDbRdsNameList.summary: Queries instances that are used to store the data of a database.

DescribeDrdsInstance.title: DescribeDrdsInstance
DescribeDrdsInstance.summary: Queries the details of a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

DescribeDrdsInstanceDbMonitor.title: DescribeDrdsInstanceDbMonitor
DescribeDrdsInstanceDbMonitor.summary: Queries the performance monitoring data of a specified database.

DescribeDrdsInstanceLevelTasks.title: DescribeDrdsInstanceLevelTasks
DescribeDrdsInstanceLevelTasks.summary: Queries the unfinished tasks of PolarDB-X 1.0 instances.

DescribeDrdsInstanceMonitor.title: DescribeDrdsInstanceMonitor
DescribeDrdsInstanceMonitor.summary: Queries the details of the monitoring data of a specified instance.

DescribeDrdsInstanceVersion.title: DescribeDrdsInstanceVersion
DescribeDrdsInstanceVersion.summary: Queries the version of a specific PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

DescribeDrdsInstances.title: DescribeDrdsInstances
DescribeDrdsInstances.summary: Queries instances that meet the specified conditions.

DescribeDrdsParams.title: DescribeDrdsParams
DescribeDrdsParams.summary: Queries parameters that you configure for an instance or a database.

DescribeDrdsRdsInstances.title: DescribeDrdsRdsInstances
DescribeDrdsRdsInstances.summary: Queries the information about all custom ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instances in a PolarDB-X instance.

DescribeDrdsShardingDbs.title: DescribeDrdsShardingDbs
DescribeDrdsShardingDbs.summary: Queries the database shards of an PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

DescribeDrdsSqlAuditStatus.title: DescribeDrdsSqlAuditStatus
DescribeDrdsSqlAuditStatus.summary: Queries the SQL audit details of a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

DescribeDrdsTasks.title: DescribeDrdsTasks
DescribeDrdsTasks.summary: Queries tasks that you perform to modify an instance.

DescribeHotDbList.title: DescribeHotDbList
DescribeHotDbList.summary: Queries the information about databases on which hots-pot scale-out is performed.

DescribeInstDbSlsInfo.title: DescribeInstDbSlsInfo
DescribeInstDbSlsInfo.summary: Queries the names of the Log Service project and the Logstore used by the SQL audit feature.

DescribeInstanceAccounts.title: DescribeInstanceAccounts
DescribeInstanceAccounts.summary: Queries information about an instance account.

DescribeInstanceSwitchAzone.title: DescribeInstanceSwitchAzone
DescribeInstanceSwitchAzone.summary: Check whether zone switching is enabled

DescribeInstanceSwitchNetwork.title: DescribeInstanceSwitchNetwork
DescribeInstanceSwitchNetwork.summary: Queries whether you can change the network type of a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

DescribePreCheckResult.title: DescribePreCheckResult
DescribePreCheckResult.summary: Queries the result of a precheck.

DescribeRDSPerformance.title: DescribeRDSPerformance
DescribeRDSPerformance.summary: Queries the details about the performance data of storage-layer ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL.

DescribeRdsCommodity.title: DescribeRdsCommodity
DescribeRdsCommodity.summary: Queries the data of ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instances that are purchased for a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

DescribeRdsPerformanceSummary.title: DescribeRdsPerformanceSummary
DescribeRdsPerformanceSummary.summary: You can call the interface DescribeRdsPerformanceSummary to query RDS instance's performance details, such as CPU.

DescribeRdsSuperAccountInstances.title: DescribeRdsSuperAccountInstances
DescribeRdsSuperAccountInstances.summary: Queries the privileged accounts of ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instances.

DescribeRecycleBinStatus.title: DescribeRecycleBinStatus
DescribeRecycleBinStatus.summary: Queries the status of the table recycle bin.

DescribeRecycleBinTables.title: DescribeRecycleBinTables
DescribeRecycleBinTables.summary: Queries the tables that can be restored in the recycle bin.

DescribeRestoreOrder.title: DescribeRestoreOrder
DescribeRestoreOrder.summary: You can call the DescribeRestoreOrder operation to view the details of the order.

DescribeShardTaskInfo.title: DescribeShardTaskInfo
DescribeShardTaskInfo.summary: Queries information about a tool used to perform conversion and sharding.

DescribeSqlFlashbakTask.title: DescribeSqlFlashbakTask
DescribeSqlFlashbakTask.summary: Queries the flashback tasks that are performed on a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

DescribeTable.title: DescribeTable
DescribeTable.summary: Queries information about the schema of a table.

DescribeTableListByType.title: DescribeTableListByType
DescribeTableListByType.summary: Queries tables based on a table type.

DescribeTables.title: DescribeTables
DescribeTables.summary: Queries all tables of a specific database within a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

DisableSqlAudit.title: DisableSqlAudit
DisableSqlAudit.summary: Disables the SQL audit feature for a database.

EnableSqlAudit.title: EnableSqlAudit
EnableSqlAudit.summary: Enables the SQL audit feature for a database.

EnableSqlFlashbackMatchSwitch.title: EnableSqlFlashbackMatchSwitch
EnableSqlFlashbackMatchSwitch.summary: You can call this operation to implement precise data recovery during SQL flashback. In this case, the information about the execution QUERY is added to the RDS BINLOG used by the DRDS database.

FlashbackRecycleBinTable.title: FlashbackRecycleBinTable
FlashbackRecycleBinTable.summary: Restores a logical table that is deleted.

GetDrdsDbRdsRelationInfo.title: GetDrdsDbRdsRelationInfo
GetDrdsDbRdsRelationInfo.summary: Queries the structure of storage instances for a Distributed Relational Database Service (DRDS) database.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags of a resource.

ManagePrivateRds.title: ManagePrivateRds
ManagePrivateRds.summary: Manages a custom ApsaraDB RDS instance at the storage layer.

ModifyAccountPrivilege.title: ModifyAccountPrivilege
ModifyAccountPrivilege.summary: Modifies the permissions that are granted to an account.

ModifyDrdsInstanceDescription.title: ModifyDrdsInstanceDescription
ModifyDrdsInstanceDescription.summary: You can call this operation to modify the instance description.

ModifyDrdsIpWhiteList.title: ModifyDrdsIpWhiteList
ModifyDrdsIpWhiteList.summary: You can call this operation to modify the database whitelist.

ModifyPolarDbReadWeight.title: ModifyPolarDbReadWeight
ModifyPolarDbReadWeight.summary: You can call this operation ModifyPolarDbReadWeight  to modify read/write weights of a specified PolarDB cluster.

ModifyRdsReadWeight.title: ModifyRdsReadWeight
ModifyRdsReadWeight.summary: Modifies the weights of ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instances. PolarDB-X distributes read and write requests to ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instances based on the assigned weights.

PutStartBackup.title: PutStartBackup
PutStartBackup.summary: You can call this operation to submit a data backup task.

RefreshDrdsAtomUrl.title: RefreshDrdsAtomUrl
RefreshDrdsAtomUrl.summary: After the connection to the RDS instance is changed, you can call the RefreshDrdsAtomUrl to refresh the connections between DRDS and apsaradb for RDS instances.

ReleaseInstanceInternetAddress.title: ReleaseInstanceInternetAddress
ReleaseInstanceInternetAddress.summary: You can call this ReleaseInstanceInternetAddress to release the public endpoint of an RDS instance. This ensures the security of the instance.

RemoveDrdsDbFailedRecord.title: RemoveDrdsDbFailedRecord
RemoveDrdsDbFailedRecord.summary: You can call this operation to delete the RemoveDrdsDbFailedRecord that failed to be created.

RemoveInstanceAccount.title: RemoveInstanceAccount
RemoveInstanceAccount.summary: You can call the interface RemoveInstanceAccount to delete an account.

RemoveRecycleBinTable.title: RemoveRecycleBinTable
RemoveRecycleBinTable.summary: Deletes a table in the recycle bin.

RestartDrdsInstance.title: RestartDrdsInstance
RestartDrdsInstance.summary: Call the RestartDrdsInstance operation to restart the instance.

RollbackInstanceVersion.title: RollbackInstanceVersion
RollbackInstanceVersion.summary: Rolls back the version of a specified instance.

SetBackupPolicy.title: SetBackupPolicy
SetBackupPolicy.summary: You can call the SetBackupPolicy to set backup policy.

SetupBroadcastTables.title: SetupBroadcastTables
SetupBroadcastTables.summary: Configures a broadcast table for a database.

SetupDrdsParams.title: SetupDrdsParams
SetupDrdsParams.summary: Configures parameters for a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

SetupRecycleBinStatus.title: SetupRecycleBinStatus
SetupRecycleBinStatus.summary: Enables the table recycle bin for a database.

SetupTable.title: SetupTable
SetupTable.summary: You can call the SetupTable operation to perform a full table scan.

SubmitCleanTask.title: SubmitCleanTask
SubmitCleanTask.summary: Submits a cleanup task for the scale-out of a PolarDB-X database.

SubmitHotExpandPreCheckTask.title: SubmitHotExpandPreCheckTask
SubmitHotExpandPreCheckTask.summary: Submits a precheck task for the hot-spot scale-out of a PolarDB-X database. The task is used to check the table that does not contain the primary key.

SubmitHotExpandTask.title: SubmitHotExpandTask
SubmitHotExpandTask.summary: Submits a hot-spot scale-out task for a database.

SubmitSmoothExpandPreCheck.title: SubmitSmoothExpandPreCheck
SubmitSmoothExpandPreCheck.summary: Submits a precheck task for the smooth scale-out of a PolarDB-X database.

SubmitSmoothExpandPreCheckTask.title: SubmitSmoothExpandPreCheckTask
SubmitSmoothExpandPreCheckTask.summary: Submits a precheck task for the smooth scale-out of a PolarDB-X 1.0 database.

SubmitSqlFlashbackTask.title: SubmitSqlFlashbackTask
SubmitSqlFlashbackTask.summary: Call the SubmitSqlFlashbackTask API to submit a flashback SQL task.

SwitchGlobalBroadcastType.title: SwitchGlobalBroadcastType
SwitchGlobalBroadcastType.summary: Switches the mode of broadcast tables from the multi-write mode to the asynchronous link mode.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: You can call this operation to untag resources.

UpdateInstanceNetwork.title: UpdateInstanceNetwork
UpdateInstanceNetwork.summary: Changes the network type of a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

UpdatePrivateRdsClass.title: UpdatePrivateRdsClass
UpdatePrivateRdsClass.summary: Updates the specifications of a custom ApsaraDB RDS instance at the storage layer.

UpdateResourceGroupAttribute.title: UpdateResourceGroupAttribute
UpdateResourceGroupAttribute.summary: Transfers an instance to a new resource group.

UpgradeHiStoreInstance.title: UpgradeHiStoreInstance
UpgradeHiStoreInstance.summary: Upgrades the version of a column-oriented storage instance of a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

UpgradeInstanceVersion.title: UpgradeInstanceVersion
UpgradeInstanceVersion.summary: Upgrades the version of a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

ValidateShardTask.title: ValidateShardTask
ValidateShardTask.summary: Checks whether a task to convert a table shard or shard a table is valid.
